title: Oliver Straw (@Ollie_Straw) | Twitter
body: The latest Tweets from Oliver Straw (@Ollie_Straw). @wvufootball commit⛰ @prokickaustralia 🇦🇺🇺🇸 19 years old Melbourne,Australia📍
readable_content:
Oliver Straw (@Ollie_Straw) (2021-10-22):
I am incredibly excited and honoured to announce that I have committed to The University of West Virginia to study and play football on full scholarship in 2022. Thank you for the opportunity @NealBrown_WVU @CoachKoonz @WVUfootball #TAKEMEHOME22 #HailWV #TrustTheClimb
